title: Incorrect Handling of Source Attachment Changes for JAR Files
description: This bug report addresses the issue of incorrectly handling source attachment changes for JAR files.
OB: In the build dated 20020416, when a user changes the attached source of a JAR file, it triggers a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta. This behavior is clearly incorrect. As a result, the user interface (UI) responds by closing the class file editors that were opened for this JAR file. While closing the editors is appropriate for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta, it's not the expected behavior in this case.
EB: The expected behavior is that when changing the attached source of a JAR file, it should trigger a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, rather than a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta. This change should ensure that the UI responds correctly without closing the class file editors.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Use the software with the build date of 20020416. 2) Change the attached source of a JAR file. You will observe that a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired and class file editors are closed. Although an attempt was made to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI did not react as expected.
